The Space

CNN TRAVEL,
1 February, 2013
Named Ericeira as one of the "4 super swell surf towns (even if you don't surf) off the world".
See (website hidden)

Casa do Alto is an unique villa with cascading pool and magnificent view of countryside and sea line with total privacy and located in a National ECOLOGICAL RESERVE Area.

Enjoy the sun on the edge of the pool with your friends and family with total privacy!. Or recover your strengths after a surfing day at Ribeira de Ihas World Surf Spot (4 km), or after a beach horse ride along the Atlantic coast of Ericeira (3 km from the villa) or after a visit to the romantic Lord Byron's Sintra.

Casa do Alto is located in the top of Ribeira D'Ilhas valley, and just 5 to 10 minutes drive from several beaches and from the old fishing village of Ericeira. The wildlife surrounding Casa do Alto at the top of the valley is reflected in the number of wild pigs, rabbits, and eagles performing their natural activities. The eagle's flights justify why locals named it as the "mountain of good air." These unique characteristics build the Zen atmosphere of the villa and its unique privacy.
Ribeira de Ilhas beach (4 km from Casa do Alto driving trough the valley) is classified as a WORLD SURF SPOT and recently renovated, being now considered one of the best beaches of the Atlantic Coast.

Rated by its guest as a five stars option, we can also provide you additional services such as: additional cleaning (1 per week included), beach horse ridding, several out door activities, surf courses, daily breakfast service and dinner services performed by the Company “Empadas&Ca”, none as one of the best food services provider in the area.
Exceptional services for exceptional holidays, or total relax and privacy. Its you're family decision.

This modern (minimalist) villa with architectural signature, consists of two floors plus deck:
Ground floor with fully equipped kitchen with access to dining room and a spacious living room with solarium and direct access to the pool, plus 3 bedrooms (glass suite with double bed and bathroom and two bedrooms with 2 double beds and bathroom);
Deck with 100 sqm with cascade pool and several areas for relax, the earth of this villa where you can take sunbaths from sun rising to fall. The pool is treated with ionizing radiation (100% chemical-free) and heated by high performance solar panels that can increase the water temperature until 27 Celsius, allowing unique swimming experiences at sunset.
The first floor with the master suite with panoramic bathroom, dressing room and a terrace of 20 m2 with an absolutely unique view over the countryside, the pool and the ocean!

If you intend to go further (you have 10 beaches nearby and two golf courses ...), you can reach Mafra in 15 minutes (Convent of Saramago’s Literature Nobel Prize), Sintra in 25 (the poets romantic villa of Lord Byron), and Lisbon by highway (44km) in 40 minutes. Renting a car is the best option.

Have a nice and unique stay.
João

  • Ainsley

    Casa Alto is an absolutely stunning Villa, in a beautiful location. The house is incredibly well kept, and could not be more highly recommended for someone wishing to stay in Portugal.

    João was a fantastic host, and was eager and happy to help us with any questions we had about the area, transport or the villa.

    Me and me friends had a fantastic week relaxing at Casa do Alto and would definitely return again.

    May 2014
  • Gregory

    Exceptionnel ! Proche de tout (plages de toute beauté, commerces, sites, restaurants...) et incroyablement préservée, la maison est un concentré de beauté, d'intelligence et de sérénité. Le site est merveilleux, les couchers et levers du soleil sont à couper le souffle, on s'endort face aux étoiles - une expérience unique...
    Joao et Patrizia sont des hôtes merveilleux ; attentifs, attentionnés, réactifs, jonglant avec les langues, ils ont veillé sur notre bien-être tout en discrétion et nous ont permis de découvrir certains joyaux de la région. Merci à eux et à la Casa Alto pour cet incroyable séjour : nous espérons y revenir vite !

    --------------------------------------

    Amazing! Close to everything (beautiful shores and beaches, sites, restaurants and markets) and incredibly preserved, the house is a perfect combination of beauty, intelligence and serenity. Skies, sunrises and sunsets are breathtaking; falling asleep gazing at the stars is a unique experience.
    Joao and Patrizia have been wonderful hosts; they cared about our well-being with gentleness, tact and reactivity and were always of good advice. Thanks to them them we discovered many jewels of the area. We are very grateful and had a wonderful time in Casa Alto: hopefully we'll be back soon!

    May 2014
  • Severine

    This house is amazing. I almost do not want to say it to keep this place secret only for us. It is big with a lot of space, a huge terrace and very well equipped. We were two couples with young children and it was perfect for the grown-ups and for the kids. The location is great, close to Lisbon and very close to beautiful beaches and coastline (a car is needed though). The fireplace was a bonus to get the house warm in the evenings of late October.
    Joao was very helpful and friendly. Tanks a lot !

    November 2013
  • Siawash

    Ok, first the bad news: the pictures that you can see are quite misleading. That's for the bad news.

    The good news is: the place is way bigger than you would think (based on the pics), beautiful living room, two big bed-rooms, two small guest rooms which easily accompany 8 person (we were 8). Awesome pool, good kitchen on a very private spot.

    Joao, the host, is very friendly and always reachable and will also help you finding a good surfing school if you're into that.

    All in all 11/10 would book again.

    September 2013
  • Nina

    Best place ever. I went to villa Casa Alto with 7 friends for surfing and beach holiday and we absolutely recommend it to everybody! It is situated a little outside the village Casais do Monte Bom (15 minutes from Ericeira city center) on the top of a hill and is surrounded by nature, a unique location! The architecture of the villa is spacious and gives you fantastic views from everywhere in the house. Bonus: The wheater is often a lot warmer and sunnier than directly on the beach. Some days, we decided just to stay at home enjoying...

    The two bigger rooms (especially the one in the first floor) and the infinity pool were also a highlight for me.

    In the surrounding area we especially liked Ericeira city centre (good sea food, cocktails at tubos Bar), the Beach of Sao Juliao, Sintra and medieval Obidos.

    Joao was a great host, he knows the region, came personally to welcome us and helped us with everything we needed. Thanks a lot for that! Hope to see you again!

    Nina & Entourage ;)

    September 2013
    Response from João:

    Thank you Nina for your very kind words.
    Please come again wherever you want with your Entourage !
    All the best,
    João

    September 2013

  • Oliver

    .. a nice holiday comes with good location, nice house etc. A great holiday is one where you leave a foreign county as a "second home" -this is how we feel about Casa Alto!

    It is a fantastic place nearby the sea settled in nature. We enjoyed every moment during our trip. Our host Joao made every effort to support us and made it a perfect holiday. Trips to Lisboa/Sintra besides all the nearby local fishing villages makes it a perfect location. The Villa comes with a great modern design, open space and wide windows to experience the nature.

    We stayed as a family of three and I can highly recommend this for any family with kids to go as well.

    As a surfer all good spots are in short distance. The little distance to the wild shores feels very relaxing.

    Many thanks to Joao and family. We will be back soon!!

    May 2013

About
Born in Lisbon. Fifty of hardware and twenty five of software. Former banking manager converted into Corporate Finance banking entrepreneur by the 2008 economic crisis. I like very much to know new people and discuss new ideas and projects, play golf, reading and (I hope one day), writing. I have 4 kids that are the most important achievement from my first half of my life (0-50) and I am building the second part (50-100), now with much more experience. Above all, I am a happy man.
